Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cremycin-5 (natural AMPs; nematode; invertebrates, animals; UCSS1a, 3S=S; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 48.9% similarity toINSECT Drosomycin.Activity: zone diffusion assay: Active against A. niger (CL 14.9 uM),  A. nidulans RCho15 or RCho10 or tCho4 (CL 0.7-1.5 uM), G. candidum (CL 4.7 uM), N. crassa (CL 0.6 uM), C. albicans 16 strains (CL 1.8-26 uM),  (CL 14.9 uM), C. tropicalis JX1009 or JX1016 or JX1017 (CL 8.8 uM), S. cerevisiae (CL 6.7 uM). Updated 7/2021, 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Zhu S, Gao B. 2014
Literature Information.Title: Nematode-derived drosomycin-type antifungal peptides provide evidence for plant-to-ecdysozoan horizontal transfer of a disease resistance gene
